name: Greninja V-UNION
author: Shin Nagasawa

abilities.name: Ninja Body
abilities.effect: Whenever your opponent plays an Item card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Feel the Way
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may have your opponent reveal their hand.

attacks.name: Union Gain
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 {W} Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Twister Shuriken
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Waterfall Bind
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.

rule_box:
Once per game during your turn, combine 4 different Greninja V-UNION from your discard pile and put them onto your Bench.
When your Pokémon V-UNION is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.
